Class ARFFConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tsc.uea.ac.uk.wearablemotiontracker.ARFFConverter

  • public class ARFFConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts data coming in to ARFF format and writes to text file Created by JCLEMENTS on 14/04/2017.

        gyro - gyroscope
